org.apache.activemq.core.paging

Interface PagingManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.apache.activemq.core.server.ActiveMQComponent, HierarchicalRepositoryChangeListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PagingManagerImpl

    public interface PagingManager
extends org.apache.activemq.core.server.ActiveMQComponent, HierarchicalRepositoryChangeListener

        PagingStore getPageStore(org.apache.activemq.api.core.SimpleString address)
